descrBreve: They will dedicate 12 days to freeing themselves from the spirit of the world, which is opposed to the spirit of Christ. (TVD 227)
descr: If the world hates you, know that it has hated me before you. If you were of the world, the world would love its own; but because you are not of the world, but I have chosen you out of the world, therefore the world hates you. (John 15:18-19)

descrBreve: From the fact that we do not know ourselves, we suffer terrible tribulations. (Saint Teresa)
descr: The knowledge of oneself and one's own sins is the bread that must be eaten in this path of prayer with all foods, even the most delicate ones, and without it, one cannot be sustained. (Saint Teresa of Jesus - Life, Ch. 13, 15)

descrBreve: Mary is a mystery of grace unknown even to the most learned and spiritual among Christians! (TVD 21)
descr: True devotion to Mary is internal; it comes from the mind and heart; it stems from the esteem one has for her, from the high regard one forms about her greatness, and from the love one bears for her.

descrBreve: This devotion is necessary to perfectly find Jesus, love Him, and serve Him. (TVD 62)
descr: I now consider everything a loss compared to the surpassing worth of knowing Christ Jesus my Lord, for whose sake I have lost all things and consider them garbage, that I may gain Christ. (Philippians 3:8)
